data.title: Why exhibit
data.meta_description: At DanFish you can present your products and services, and brand your company to potential and existing customers. DanFish is an excellent opportunity to meetâ€¦
data.text:
DanFish is visited by 10-15,000 international visitors, who are typically fishermen, skippers, boat builders, representatives from shipyards and ports.

As a rule, around 400 exhibitors from 25-30 countries participate, presenting novelties in: Net, trawl, rope, wire, motors, electronics, navigation and communication equipment, storage equipment, process equipment, rescue equipment and much, much more. The service sector will also be well represented at the fair.

At DanFish International there is ample opportunity to meet both a Danish and an international audience, and here you can as a company:
